Explore.title: Explore CMYZU Business School
Explore.description: Discover our school features, faculty excellence, and international educational environment
Explore.item_1_description: CMYZU Business School is committed to cultivating management talents with international perspectives and innovative thinking, combining theory with practice to provide comprehensive management education.
Explore.item_2_description: Outstanding faculty from top universities worldwide, with expertise covering all aspects of management, dedicated to academic research and educational innovation.
Explore.item_3_description: Partnerships with over 100 prestigious universities worldwide, offering students overseas exchange, dual degree and international internship opportunities.

Departments.title: Departments & Programs
Departments.description: Diverse academic fields cultivating the professional knowledge and skills needed for future leaders
Departments.department_1_description: Cultivating professional management talents with comprehensive management knowledge and practical capabilities, covering strategic management, marketing management, and human resource management.
Departments.department_2_description: Combining information technology with management knowledge to cultivate information management professionals needed in the digital age, emphasizing AI and big data applications.
Departments.department_3_description: Focusing on financial market analysis, investment and financial planning, risk management and other professional fields to cultivate financial professionals.
Departments.department_4_description: Cultivating international business talents with global perspectives and cross-cultural communication capabilities, emphasizing adaptability in the globalized business environment.
